sense.gloss: use (of capital, funds, etc.), management, investment
turnover (of goods, funds, etc.), circulation, flow (of customers)
reversal (of a situation), turnaround, turnabout, turning the tables, sudden change
transfer (of a call, patient, etc.), forwarding (a letter, email, etc.), redirection
fall (in position, standing, etc.), downfall, descent, degradation, comedown, demotion
job transfer, job relocation, intra-company transfer
falling down, tumbling, overturning, turning over
turning around (the other way), reversal (of direction, course, etc.), inversion, flipping
producing a positive from a negative, producing a negative from a positive
complete change, reversal, (an) about-face, sudden transformation
diversion, putting something to another use
moving (location, with the times, etc.), change, transition
imputation, shifting (blame, responsibility, etc.), passing the buck
putting the cart before the horse, mistaking the means for the end, getting one's priorities backwards
moving, changing residence, change of address
moving from place to place, being passed around repeatedly
to turn, to shift, to alter, to distract
changing (job, career, lifestyle, social position, beliefs, etc.)
transcription (of a text, DNA, RNA, etc.), copying, transfer (printing)
to fall over, to roll over
to be scattered about, to be lying around
(of a situation or outcome) to change, to turn out
to come easily, to be common, to fall into one's hands, to grow on trees
to fall down, to fall over
to turn out, to play out
to abandon Christianity (and convert to Buddhism), to apostatize
(for a geisha) to prostitute (herself) in secret
moving out (to), moving to a different place
transfer (to a new post), being transferred
change in pronunciation or meaning of a word, sound change, word with an altered pronunciation or meaning
turning or twisting part of a text (in Chinese poetry)
more and more, increasingly, all the more
to knock down, to knock over
fishing with multiple hooks on a weighted line
revolution (of a celestial body around another)

sdata.j: 「↑転↑↓ころ↓がる↑石↑↓いし↓は↑苔↑↓こけ↓をもつけず」はことわざである。
sdata.e: A rolling stone gathers no moss is a proverb.

sdata.j: ↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓は↑都会↑↓とかい↓の↑環境↑↓かんきょう↓を↑破壊↑↓はかい↓することなく↑資源↑↓しげん↓↑利用↑↓りよう↓を↑持続↑↓じぞく↓することのできる↑道具↑↓どうぐ↓である。
sdata.e: Bicycles are tools for urban sustainability.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なん↓だって・・・いまだに↑運転↑↓うんてん↓できないのか？
sdata.e: What... you still don't know how to drive?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑運転↑↓うんてん↓するときにどんなに↑注意深↑↓ちゅういぶか↓くしてもし↑過↑↓す↓ぎることはない。
sdata.e: You cannot be too careful when driving.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑運転↑↓うんてん↓しない↑方↑↓ほう↓がいい。
sdata.e: You had better not drive a car.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑車↑↓くるま↓の↑運転↑↓うんてん↓が↑出来↑↓でき↓ますか。
sdata.e: Can you drive a car?

sdata.j: あなたは↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑運転↑↓うんてん↓する↑事↑↓こと↓ができますか。
sdata.e: Can you drive a car?

sdata.j: あなたは↑自動車↑↓じどうしゃ↓を↑運転↑↓うんてん↓できますか。
sdata.e: Can you drive a car?

sdata.j: あなたは↑自動車↑↓じどうしゃ↓の↑運転↑↓うんてん↓ができますか。
sdata.e: Can you drive a car?

sdata.j: ↑車↑↓くるま↓は↑運転↑↓うんてん↓できるの？
sdata.e: Can you drive a car?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑車↑↓くるま↓の↑運転↑↓うんてん↓ができますよね。
sdata.e: You can drive a car, can't you?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑資金↑↓しきん↓をうまく↑運転↑↓うんてん↓しなくてはならない。
sdata.e: You must employ your capital well.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑運転↑↓うんてん↓↑免許↑↓めんきょ↓をとるには、まだ↑若↑↓わか↓すぎる。
sdata.e: You're still too young to get a driver's license.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑試験↑↓しけん↓に↑受↑↓う↓かったのだから、↑一↑↓いち↓↑人↑↓にん↓で↑運転↑↓うんてん↓できるよ。
sdata.e: Now that you have passed your test, you can drive on your own.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はまだ↑運転↑↓うんてん↓↑免許↑↓めんきょ↓がとれるほどの↑年齢↑↓ねんれい↓になっていない。
sdata.e: You're not old enough to get a driver's license.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は２、３↑日↑↓にち↓すれば↑車↑↓くるま↓の↑運転↑↓うんてん↓が↑出来↑↓でき↓るようになるだろう。
sdata.e: You'll be able to drive a car in a few days.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑数↑↓すう↓↑日↑↓にち↓で↑車↑↓くるま↓の↑運転↑↓うんてん↓ができるようになるだろう。
sdata.e: You'll be able to drive a car in a few days.

sdata.j: ↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓には↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓をあげるよ。
sdata.e: I will give you a bicycle for your birthday.

sdata.e: I will give you a bicycle for your birthday.

sdata.e: I will give you a bicycle for your birthday.

sdata.j: ↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓には↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓をあげるよ。
sdata.e: You shall have a bicycle for your birthday.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑誕生↑↓たんじょう↓↑日↑↓び↓に↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓を↑贈↑↓おく↓ろう。

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓を２、３↑日↑↓にち↓↑貸↑↓か↓してくれませんか。
sdata.e: Could you lend me your bicycle for a couple of days?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓のと↑似↑↓に↓ている。
sdata.e: Your bicycle is similar to mine.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓よりも↑上等↑↓じょうとう↓です。
sdata.e: Your bike is better than mine.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓のラジオを↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓と↑取↑↓と↓り↑替↑↓か↓えっこしないか。
sdata.e: Will you give me your radio for my bicycle?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓なすべては↑車↑↓くるま↓を↑運転↑↓うんてん↓するための↑免許↑↓めんきょ↓を↑取↑↓と↓ることだ。
sdata.e: All you need is to get a driver's license.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑自動車↑↓じどうしゃ↓の↑運転↑↓うんてん↓↑法↑↓ほう↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えてあげよう。
sdata.e: I'll teach you how to drive a car.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑車↑↓くるま↓の↑運転↑↓うんてん↓の↑仕方↑↓しかた↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えてあげるよ。
sdata.e: I'll teach you how to drive a car.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑仕事↑↓しごと↓ぶりを↑認↑↓みと↓められる↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑給料↑↓きゅうりょう↓の↑値上↑↓ねあ↓げのことをいうと、↑本末転倒↑↓ほんまつてんとう↓しているのではないかと↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑思↑↓おも↓いたくなる。
sdata.e: When you speak of a pay-raise before recognition, I am inclined to think you are putting the cart before the horse.
